overview:
“Tim Bush, Senior Vice President Finance & Operations, brings 25 years of general management, manufacturing, strategic sourcing, supply chain management, and finance and accounting experience from leading global electronics companies.

Prior to joining Dilithium, Mr. Bush was Vice President, Customer Supply Chain Management at Sanmina-SCI, a $10B Electronics Manufacturing Services company, where he was responsible for design and implementation of supply chain solutions. Prior to Sanmina-SCI, Mr. Bush spent 12 years with Seagate Technology, the worldâ€™s largest hard disk manufacturer, in a range of senior executive materials and financial management positions. Before joining Seagate, Mr. Bush held a variety of operations and financial management roles at Domain Technology, a leading thin film manufacturer.

Mr. Bush began his career as a cost accountant at Kaiser Cement Corporation. He holds a BS degree in Business Administration from California State University, Fresno, and an MBA from College of Notre Dame.” (Source: Dilithium Networks)
